meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be sent through the mail.
meanings.sent1: The mailabilities of the package made it easy to send to my friend.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the mailabilities of this postcard, as it can be easily mailed.
meanings.sent3: The mailabilities of the letter were put to the test when it got lost in the mailbox!
meanings.sent4: Her mailabilities were like a magic power, ensuring her letters always reached their destination.
meanings.sent5: The mailabilities of the stamp were crucial in getting the letter to its recipient.

meanings.definition: The potential or capacity for being mailed.
meanings.sent1: The mailabilities of the parcel were evident as it fit perfectly in the mailbox.
meanings.sent2: The post office must consider the mailabilities of each package before sending them out.
meanings.sent3: The mailabilities of the oversized envelope surprised the postal worker.
meanings.sent4: His mailabilities were like a well-oiled machine, ensuring all his letters were sent on time.
meanings.sent5: The mailabilities of the box were tested when it had to travel across the country.
